titles.title: Words Matter Act of 2024
Words Matter Act of 2024
A bill to amend Federal law to remove the terms "mentally retarded" and "mental retardation", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Words Matter Act of 2024
This bill removes outdated terminology in specified statutes by replacing references to mentally retarded and mental retardation with intellectual disability.
